  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class SettingsPanel
extends BasicPanel
    SettingsPanel Description: SettingsPanel contains the sound and control key settings of the game.
    Version:
    v1.0
    Author:
    A. Burak Sahin
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void updateKey(int oldKey,
                      int newKey)

        • rightKey
        • shootKey
        with newKey
        Parameters:
        oldKey - the key to be replaced.
        newKey - new assignment for oldKey
